mutants.code:
import re

def convert_string_to_word_list(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = re.findall('', string)
    words = [word for word in words if word.isalpha()]
    words.sort(reverse=True)
    words = sorted(words, key=lambda x: (x[::-1], words.index(x)))
    return words

import re

def convert_string_to_word_list(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = re.findall("[\\w']+|[.,!?;]", string)
    words = [word for word in words if word.isalpha()]
    words.sort(reverse=False)
    words = sorted(words, key=lambda x: (x[::-1], words.index(x)))
    return words

import re

def convert_string_to_word_list(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = re.findall("[\\w']+|[.,!?;]", string)
    words = [word for word in words if word.isalpha()]
    words.sort(reverse=True)
    words = sorted(words, key=lambda x: (x[::+1], words.index(x)))
    return words

import re

def convert_string_to_word_list(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = re.findall("[\\w']+|[.,!?;]", string)
    words = [word for word in words if word.isalpha()]
    words.sort(reverse=True)
    words = sorted(words, key=lambda x: (x[::--1], words.index(x)))
    return words
